name: Out of Earshot
description:
By: fx46, Jeremy Boulet, paikwon, olyou & StevenLam

Web version: https://lam-steven.github.io/out-of-earshot/

You play as a student who is trying to sneak out of school. It's a simple top-down game where you have to explore the map to look for keys to escape. When all keys are found, go to the exit to win! Beware of teachers roaming the halls, they'll put you right back in detention.

You have 3 gauges that, when filled, will cause you to produce a sound that may alert the teachers around you. You need to keep an eye on them.
- Sneezes
- Farts
- Stomach growls

To move around the map, you can:
- Walk (slow and quiet)
- Run (fast, but noisy and makes you hungry)
- Dash gassily (instant, but noisy and limited)

There are 4 keys you need to collect. After that, you need to find the exit.
If a teacher catches you, you'll be sent right back to detention.
After 3 strikes, who knows? Better avoid it.
